thread.title: Beverly AinscowCustomer
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Beverly AinscowCustomer

author: Beverly AinscowCustomer
title: Beverly AinscowCustomer
text: I love the themes esp, book shop, pet store, Christmas house etc. I've bought at least 10 puzzles in last 18 months but haven't received a code number or discount. A discount for being a good customer would certainly urge me to buy another puzzle.
